def validate_function_prototype(function_name, prototype):
    # Validate function prototype format
    expected_format = prototype.format(function_name=function_name)
    return expected_format == prototype

def generate_notification(function_name, prototype):
    # Validate function prototype format
    if not validate_function_prototype(function_name, prototype):
        raise ValueError("Invalid function prototype")
